resources.string:
Hi, my nane is Aleks. 

 I love fish. 

 The kind that is alive and swims around in an aquariumor river, or a lake, and definitely the ocean 
Fun fact is that I have several aquariums and also a river. 

I Like eating fish, too. Raw fish. Grilled fish. Smoked fish poached fish - not so much 
 And sometimes I even go fishing. 
And even less sometimes, I actually catch something. n
0nce, when I was camping in Canada, and very hungry, I even caught aq large salmon with my hands 

 I'lL be happy to teach you how to make your own aquarium. 
You should ask soneone else about fishing, though.
